content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 1, Juventus 1.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 1, Juventus 1.
Foul by Fernando Llorente (Juventus).
Marcelo (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid).
Carlos Tévez (Juventus) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Juventus. Roberto Pereyra replaces Paul Pogba.
Attempt missed. Arturo Vidal (Juventus) header from the centre of the box is too high.
Attempt saved. Paul Pogba (Juventus) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Fernando Llorente.
Paul Pogba (Juventus) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid).
Substitution, Juventus. Fernando Llorente replaces Álvaro Morata.
Attempt missed. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by James Rodríguez.

Goal!  Real Madrid 1, Juventus 1. Álvaro Morata (Juventus) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Paul Pogba with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Foul by Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid).
